nodes.text: Gilag Pitaaani was a male Nuknog podracer who resided on the planet Muunilinst. He was under the employ of the Muun Chenik Kruun.

In 0 ABY, Pitaaani was among the five podracers who raced against the Rebel pilot Luke Skywalker, who ultimately won the race on the outskirts of Pilaan, the capital city of Muunilinst. Pitanni piloted a Bin Gassi Quadrijet.
